comment: For Leftists who think the content of islamic texts are 'open to interpretation or debate', this issue has been clarified byshaykh muhammad saalih al-munajjid for everyone. Its not.
amr:
# ::snt For Leftists who think the content of islamic texts are 'open to interpretation or debate', this issue has been clarified byshaykh muhammad saalih al-munajjid for everyone. Its not.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / clarify-10
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Shaykh"
                        :op2 "Muhammad"
                        :op3 "saalih"
                        :op4 "al-munajjid"))
            :ARG1 (ii / issue-02
                  :mod (t / this))
            :beneficiary (e / everyone))
      :snt2 (ii2 / issue-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii3 / it)
            :beneficiary (p2 / person
                  :ARG1-of (l / left-19)
                  :ARG0-of (t2 / think-01
                        :ARG1 (o / open-05
                              :ARG1 (c2 / content
                                    :poss (t3 / text
                                          :mod (r / religious-group
                                                :name (n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Islam"))))
                              :ARG2 (o2 / or
                                    :op1 (ii4 / interpret-01
                                          :ARG1 c2)
                                    :op2 (d / debate-01
                                          :ARG1 c2)))))))

comment: Leftards think that their own interpretation of Islam is real i.e. it is not a political force which spreads itself through violence and fear. Problem is that when they learn the truth, its too late for them and the rest of us who have been telling them for years
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (l / left-19))
            :ARG1 (r / real-04
                  :ARG1 (ii / interpret-01
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (r2 / religious-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Islam"))
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (f / force
                                    :polarity -
                                    :mod (p2 / politics)
                                    :ARG0-of (s / spread-02
                                          :ARG1 (a / and
                                                :op1 (v / violence)
                                                :op2 (f2 / fear-01))))))))
      :snt2 (p3 / problem
            :domain (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (l2 / learn-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                        :ARG1 (t3 / truth))
                  :ARG2 (l3 / late)
                  :ARG3 (t4 / too)
                  :ARG6 (a2 / and
                        :op1 t2
                        :op2 (r3 / rest
                              :part-of (w / we)
                              :ARG0-of (t5 / tell-01

                                    :duration (m3 / multiple
                                          :op1 (t6 / temporal-quantity

                  :time l2)))
